title: Node js
description: Created Node js server using express DB and deployed in AWS. I have used the Node js server to fetch requests, respond to API calls, and create routes in the Node js server.

title: AWS
description: I am comfortable using Amazon Web Services. I have used Lambda, API Gateway, Amazon Elastic Beanstalk in AWS. Deployed website in AWS EC2 and designed Database in AWS RDS.

title: React
description: I am proficient in using React js and React Native. I have mainly created the NBCC StaffWellness React Native application. Versatile in calling API and used different third party libraries like Axios, Apisauce, Formik, Yup and React Navigation

title: Git
description: Proficient in using Git and its various function like creating branches, Pull requests, Forking and Merging Branches. I have deployed several projects in GitHub and GitLab. Architect Pipeline in GitLab connecting repo and hosting server.
